Basic Theory

A first discovery was that 1+1 is 2.

Exercise 1: My problem

Here is an important equation:

$$ \begin{equation} 2+2 = 4 \label{my:prob:eq1} \end{equation} $$

As shown in \eqref{my:prob:eq1}, 2 and 2 is 4.
